title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values retrieved from a table are being displayed in different formats in a dynamic text item and a data/text item.
EB: When entering 'new Date()' as the content for three items, saving, and previewing, the expected result is that all three items should show the same format. However, the actual result is that the data and text item show the same format, while the dynamic text item shows a different format.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Enter 'new Date()' as the content for three items.
2. Save and preview the items.
Expected result: All three items should show the same format.
Actual result: The data and text item show the same format, but the dynamic text item shows a different format.
